about_the_game:
In this DLC you find full soundtrack from the game. It is located in the soundtrack folder in the folder with the installed game. Enjoy

Included tracks :

- Treasure chest

- The River of Ages

- Decadence of the Universe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 Gb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
